ClsC_7a65b3a8.class_description: A written composition that explores a specific topic or question, typically in a structured, prose format. This class groups standalone essays as textual documents.
ClsC_7a65b3a8.evidence_excerpt: The written work that will discuss impacts of sports on culture and society.

members.entity_description: The written work that will discuss impacts of sports on culture and society.
members.resolution_context: This essay will explore the various ways in which sports impact culture and society.

ClsC_49c20077.class_description: A shared objective that members of a group, such as athletes on a team, collectively work toward.
ClsC_49c20077.evidence_excerpt: Athletes must work together towards a common goal, overcome obstacles...

members.entity_description: A shared objective that athletes work towards together in the context of sports.
members.resolution_context: Athletes must work together towards a common goal, overcome obstacles, and learn how to deal with both success and failure.

ClsC_328bd61d.class_description: Challenges or difficulties that individuals must overcome when engaging in activities such as sports participation.
ClsC_328bd61d.evidence_excerpt: Challenges or difficulties that athletes need to overcome in sports participation.

members.entity_description: Challenges or difficulties that athletes need to overcome in sports participation.
members.resolution_context: Athletes must work together towards a common goal, overcome obstacles, and learn how to deal with both success and failure.

ClsC_0e6d9e70.class_description: Concepts describing life skills and personal development outcomes gained through participation in sports, such as cooperation and coping with success and failure.
ClsC_0e6d9e70.evidence_excerpt: Life lessons learned through sports, such as cooperation and dealing with success and failure.

members.entity_description: Life lessons learned through sports, such as cooperation and dealing with success and failure.
members.resolution_context: These lessons translate into other areas of life, helping individuals become better equipped to handle challenges in their personal and professional lives.
